name: ChatTuber
description:
Welcome welcome welcome!!

Here is a fun chess battle against streamers, youtube chat can play against fav youtuber.

Added fun chess pieces that you can switch to normal as well.

have funnnnn!

NOTE:

1.Chat Moves: f7f5 = f5, g8f6 = nf6

  Moves are in format: [first square][second square]

2.Can't Make Move, Change switch pieces or start New game  while Blacks turn
